story: As you move deeper into the stronghold, a group of cyborg guards approaches. What do you do?

actions.action: Engage in combat against the cyborg guards
actions.good: Your skilled fight leaves the cyborgs lying in a heap. You loot their bodies for valuable components and gear.
actions.bad: In the heat of battle, you sustain heavy damage from the cyborgs. The encounter weakens you, but you manage to escape with your loot intact.

actions.action: Use stealth to bypass the cyborg guards
actions.good: Cleverly avoiding detection, you slip past the cyborgs unnoticed and discover a hidden cache of valuable items.
actions.bad: In your haste to move silently, you accidentally knock over a potted plant. The sound attracts the attention of the nearby cyborg guards, causing you to sustain damage.

actions.action: Persuade the cyborg guards to let you pass
actions.good: Using your charisma and finesse, you manage to convince the cyborg guards to let you pass unhindered. You pass by them undetected and find a stash of valuable items.
actions.bad: As you try to negotiate with the cyborgs, one of them suddenly malfunctions and attacks you. You take heavy damage before managing to fend it off.
